name: uddaan-consultancy
description: Uddaan Consultancy - Your Gateway to Global Opportunities

scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && PORT=5000 CORS_ORIGIN=http://localhost:3000 npm run dev
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install

author: Uddaan Consultancy
